home.title: KanaDojo - Learn Japanese Hiragana, Katakana, Kanji & Vocabulary Online
home.description: Master Japanese with KanaDojo - a fun, aesthetic, minimalist platform for learning Hiragana, Katakana, Kanji, and Vocabulary. Practice with interactive games, track progress, and customize your learning experience with 100+ themes.
home.descriptionShort: Master Japanese Hiragana, Katakana, Kanji & Vocabulary with interactive games, progress tracking, and beautiful customization options.
home.keywords: learn japanese, learn hiragana, learn katakana, learn kana, learn kanji, japanese vocabulary, hiragana practice, katakana practice, kanji practice, japanese learning app, japanese online lessons, japanese writing system, JLPT preparation, japanese language learning, kana dojo, japanese study tool, free japanese lessons

kana.title: Kana Dojo - Learn Japanese Hiragana & Katakana by Level
kana.description: Master Hiragana and Katakana with interactive games and exercises. Practice Japanese kana characters by difficulty level with instant feedback and progress tracking.
kana.keywords: hiragana, katakana, japanese kana, learn hiragana, learn katakana, kana practice, japanese alphabet

kanaBlitz.title: Kana Blitz - Test Your Hiragana & Katakana Speed
kanaBlitz.description: Test your Japanese kana recognition speed with Kana Blitz. Challenge yourself with timed exercises and track your progress.
kanaBlitz.keywords: kana speed test, hiragana speed, katakana speed, japanese kana practice

kanaGauntlet.title: Kana Gauntlet - Master Every Character
kanaGauntlet.description: Master every Hiragana and Katakana character with the Kana Gauntlet. Comprehensive practice for all Japanese kana.
kanaGauntlet.keywords: kana mastery, hiragana mastery, katakana mastery, comprehensive kana practice

kanji.title: Kanji Dojo - Learn Japanese Kanji Characters by JLPT Level
kanji.description: Learn Japanese Kanji characters organized by JLPT levels. Practice with interactive exercises, track your progress, and master thousands of kanji.
kanji.keywords: kanji, learn kanji, japanese kanji, JLPT kanji, kanji practice, kanji by level

kanjiBlitz.title: Kanji Blitz - Test Your Kanji Recognition Speed
kanjiBlitz.description: Test your Japanese kanji recognition speed with Kanji Blitz. Fast-paced exercises to improve your kanji skills.
kanjiBlitz.keywords: kanji speed test, kanji recognition, fast kanji practice

kanjiGauntlet.title: Kanji Gauntlet - Master Every Character
kanjiGauntlet.description: Master every Kanji character with the Kanji Gauntlet. Comprehensive practice for all JLPT levels.
kanjiGauntlet.keywords: kanji mastery, comprehensive kanji practice, all JLPT kanji

vocabulary.title: Vocabulary Dojo - Learn Japanese Words & Vocabulary by JLPT Level
vocabulary.description: Expand your Japanese vocabulary with words organized by JLPT levels. Interactive exercises, example sentences, and progress tracking.
vocabulary.keywords: japanese vocabulary, learn japanese words, JLPT vocabulary, vocabulary practice

vocabularyBlitz.title: Vocabulary Blitz - Test Your Japanese Vocabulary Speed
vocabularyBlitz.description: Test your Japanese vocabulary speed with Vocabulary Blitz. Fast-paced word recognition exercises.
vocabularyBlitz.keywords: vocabulary speed test, japanese words, fast vocabulary practice

vocabularyGauntlet.title: Vocabulary Gauntlet - Master Every Word
vocabularyGauntlet.description: Master comprehensive Japanese vocabulary with the Vocabulary Gauntlet. Practice all JLPT words.
vocabularyGauntlet.keywords: vocabulary mastery, comprehensive vocabulary, all JLPT words

academy.title: Academy - Japanese Learning Articles | KanaDojo
academy.description: Read comprehensive guides and articles about learning Japanese. Tips, tricks, and insights for mastering Hiragana, Katakana, Kanji, and Vocabulary.
academy.keywords: japanese learning guides, japanese tips, hiragana guide, katakana guide, kanji guide

privacy.title: Privacy Policy - Your Data Protection at KanaDojo
privacy.description: Learn how KanaDojo protects your privacy and handles your data. Our commitment to user privacy and data security.

credits.title: Credits - Contributors & Supporters
credits.description: Meet the contributors and supporters who make KanaDojo possible. Our community of developers, designers, and supporters.

experiments.description: Explore experimental features and alternative learning methods for Japanese. Try new ways to practice and learn.

translate.description: Translate between Japanese and English with our built-in translation tool. Perfect for practicing and understanding Japanese text.

zen.title: Zen Mode - Distraction-Free Japanese Practice

kanaTrain.title: Kana Training - Practice Hiragana & Katakana
kanaTrain.description: Train your Hiragana and Katakana skills with structured practice sessions. Build muscle memory and improve recognition.

vocabularyTrain.title: 語彙トレーニング - 日本語単語の練習
vocabularyTrain.description: 構造化された練習セッションで日本語の語彙を訓練します。新しい単語を効果的に学び、記憶します。

hiraganaBase.title: ひらがな基本文字（あ-わ）- 基本ひらがなを学ぶ | KanaDojo
hiraganaBase.description: 46の基本ひらがな文字（あいうえお、かきくけこ、さしすせそなど）をマスターします。すべての基本的な日本語ひらがなのローマ字付き完全リファレンスガイド。
hiraganaBase.keywords: ひらがな基本, 基本ひらがな, ひらがな表, あいうえお, ひらがなリファレンス, ひらがな基礎学習, 日本語ひらがな, ひらがなローマ字

hiraganaDakuon.title: ひらがな濁音（が-ぽ）- 濁音ひらがな文字 | KanaDojo
hiraganaDakuon.description: ひらがなの濁音・半濁音文字（がぎぐげご、ざじずぜぞ、だぢづでど、ばびぶべぼ、ぱぴぷぺぽ）を学びます。発音ガイド付きの25の濁音ひらがなをマスターします。
hiraganaDakuon.keywords: ひらがな濁音, 濁音ひらがな, 濁点付きひらがな, がぎぐげご, ひらがな半濁音, ばびぶべぼ, ぱぴぷぺぽ, ひらがな濁音文字

hiraganaYoon.title: ひらがな拗音（きゃ-りょ）- 拗音ひらがな文字 | KanaDojo
hiraganaYoon.description: ひらがなの拗音組み合わせ文字（きゃきゅきょ、しゃしゅしょ、ちゃちゅちょなど）をマスターします。ローマ字付きの33の拗音ひらがなを学びます。
hiraganaYoon.keywords: ひらがな拗音, 拗音ひらがな, ひらがな組み合わせ, きゃきゅきょ, しゃしゅしょ, ちゃちゅちょ, ひらがな二重音, 拗音

katakanaBase.title: カタカナ基本文字（ア-ワ）- 基本カタカナを学ぶ | KanaDojo
katakanaBase.description: 46の基本カタカナ文字（アイウエオ、カキクケコ、サシスセソなど）をマスターします。すべての基本的な日本語カタカナのローマ字付き完全リファレンスガイド。
katakanaBase.keywords: カタカナ基本, 基本カタカナ, カタカナ表, アイウエオ, カタカナリファレンス, カタカナ基礎学習, 日本語カタカナ, カタカナローマ字

katakanaDakuon.title: カタカナ濁音（ガ-ポ）- 濁音カタカナ文字 | KanaDojo
katakanaDakuon.description: カタカナの濁音・半濁音文字（ガギグゲゴ、ザジズゼゾ、ダヂヅデド、バビブベボ、パピプペポ）を学びます。発音ガイド付きの25の濁音カタカナをマスターします。
katakanaDakuon.keywords: カタカナ濁音, 濁音カタカナ, 濁点付きカタカナ, ガギグゲゴ, カタカナ半濁音, バビブベボ, パピプペポ, カタカナ濁音文字

katakanaYoon.title: カタカナ拗音（キャ-リョ）- 拗音カタカナ文字 | KanaDojo
katakanaYoon.description: カタカナの拗音組み合わせ文字（キャキュキョ、シャシュショ、チャチュチョなど）をマスターします。ローマ字付きの33の拗音カタカナを学びます。
katakanaYoon.keywords: カタカナ拗音, 拗音カタカナ, カタカナ組み合わせ, キャキュキョ, シャシュショ, チャチュチョ, カタカナ二重音, 拗音カタカナ

katakanaForeign.title: カタカナ外来音（ファ-ウィ）- 拡張カタカナ | KanaDojo
katakanaForeign.description: 外来語用の拡張カタカナ文字（ファ、フィ、ウィ、ウェなど）を学びます。現代日本語で使用される特殊なカタカナの組み合わせをマスターします。
katakanaForeign.keywords: カタカナ外来音, 拡張カタカナ, 外来語カタカナ, ファフィ, ウィウェ, 特殊カタカナ, 現代カタカナ, 外来語用カタカナ
